gen:link.label:label: When `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal` `OperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `OperatingIncome` - `OperatingExpenses`.
When `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` `OperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `NetOperatingResult` + `OperatingIncomeOther`.
When `NetRevenue` is reported then `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `CapitalisedProductionCosts` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `ChangeValueAgriculturalStocks` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `ChangesInValueIntangibleAssetsPropertyPlantEquipment` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `ChangesInventoriesWorkInProgress` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `ChangesValueInvestmentProperties` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `CostOfSales` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `CostsRawMaterialsConsumables` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `DepreciationPropertyPlantEquipmentAmortisationIntangibleAssets` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `EmployeeBenefitsExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `FinancialIncomeExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `GeneralAdministrativeExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `GrossOperatingResult` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `ImpairmentCurrentAssets` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `IncomeTaxExpense` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `NetOperatingResult` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `NetRevenue` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `OperatingExpensesOther` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `OperatingExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `OperatingIncomeOther` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `OperatingIncome` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `OperatingResult` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `RealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `ResultBeforeTax` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `RevaluationReserveRelease` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `SellingExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `SumOfExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax` is reported then `UnrealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Enkelvoudig` then `ResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once.
When the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Enkelvoudig` then `ResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once.
When the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig` then `ResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once.
When the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig` then `ResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal` then `CostOfSales` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal` then `GeneralAdministrativeExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal` then `GrossOperatingResult` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal` then `NetOperatingResult` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal` then `SellingExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal` then `SumOfExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `CapitalisedProductionCosts` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `ChangesInValueIntangibleAssetsPropertyPlantEquipment` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `ChangesInventoriesWorkInProgress` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `CostsOutsourcedWorkOtherExternalExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `CostsRawMaterialsConsumables` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `DepreciationPropertyPlantEquipmentAmortisationIntangibleAssets` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `DepreciationPropertyPlantEquipmentAmortisationIntangibleAssets` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `EmployeeBenefitsExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `ImpairmentCurrentAssets` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `OperatingExpensesOther` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `OperatingExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported.
When the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel` then `OperatingIncome` SHOULD NOT be reported.
`GrossOperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `NetRevenue` - `CostOfSales` + `ChangeValueAgriculturalStocks`.
`NetOperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `GrossOperatingResult` - `SumOfExpenses`.
`NetRevenue` SHOULD exist at least once.

`OperatingExpenses` SHOULD be equal to + `CostsRawMaterialsConsumables` + `CostsOutsourcedWorkOtherExternalExpenses` + `EmployeeBenefitsExpenses` + `DepreciationPropertyPlantEquipmentAmortisationIntangibleAssets` - `ChangesInValueIntangibleAssetsPropertyPlantEquipment` - `ChangesValueInvestmentProperties` + `ImpairmentCurrentAssets` + `OperatingExpensesOther` - `UnrealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments` - `RealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments`.

`OperatingIncome` SHOULD be equal to + `NetRevenue` + `ChangesInventoriesWorkInProgress` + `CapitalisedProductionCosts` + `OperatingIncomeOther` + `ChangeValueAgriculturalStocks` + `ExploitationSubsidies`.
`OperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `OperatingResultCashFlow`.
`ResultAfterTax` SHOULD be equal to + `ResultBeforeTax` - `IncomeTaxExpense` + `ShareInResultsParticipatingInterests` + `OtherIncomeExpensesAfterTax`.
`ResultBeforeTax` SHOULD be equal to + `OperatingResult` + `FinancialIncomeExpenses` + `RevaluationReserveRelease`.
`SumOfExpenses` SHOULD be equal to + `SellingExpenses` + `GeneralAdministrativeExpenses`.
